qwicksound

Class Audio

  • java.lang.Object
    • qwicksound.Audio
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PreloadedAudio, StreamingAudio

    public abstract class Audio
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single instance of audio, based on an audio file, that is to be played. There is a one-to-one relationship between an Audio object and its underlying audio file.
    Author:
    Christian Holton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService exec
      Manages the threads that are used to execute Playback objects.
      protected java.net.URL fileURL
      The URL of the audio file that is associated with this Audio.
      protected long numPlaybacks
      The number of Playbacks that have been created by, and thus associated with, this Audio.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Audio() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFileName()
      Get the filename and extension (not the complete path) of the audio file associated with this Audio object.
      java.net.URL getFileURL()
      Get the URL of the audio file associated with this Audio object.
      long getNumPlaybacks()
      Get the number of Playback instances that are currently associated with this Audio object.
      abstract Playback play()
      Play this Audio once at the default volume.
      abstract Playback play(double volume)
      Play this Audio once at the specified volume.
      abstract Playback play(double volume, int numLoops)
      Play this Audio numLoops times at the specified volume.
      abstract Playback play(int numLoops)
      Play this Audio numLoops times at the default volume.
      protected static void shutdown()
      Shutdown the Audio's ExecutorService in an orderly manner, rejecting new play requests while allowing any currently playing instances of Playback to finish before the system exits.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Audio

        public Audio()

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public abstract Playback play()
        Play this Audio once at the default volume.
        Returns:
        A new Playback instance that represents one play of this Audio at the default volume.

      • play

        public abstract Playback play(double volume)
        Play this Audio once at the specified volume.
        Parameters:
        volume - The desired volume. Volume can range from 0 (muted) to 2.0. The default volume is 1.0.
        Returns:
        A new Playback instance that represents one play of this Audio at the specified volume.

      • play

        public abstract Playback play(int numLoops)
        Play this Audio numLoops times at the default volume.
        Parameters:
        numLoops - The number of consecutive times this Audio will be played. A value of -1 will loop forever.
        Returns:
        A new Playback instance that represents numLoops consecutive plays of this Audio at the default volume.

      • play

        public abstract Playback play(double volume,
                              int numLoops)
        Play this Audio numLoops times at the specified volume.
        Parameters:
        volume - The desired volume. Volume can range from 0 (muted) to 2.0. The default volume is 1.0.
        numLoops - The number of consecutive times this Audio will be played. A value of -1 will loop forever.
        Returns:
        A new Playback instance that represents numLoops consecutive plays of this Audio at the specified volume.

      • getFileURL

        public java.net.URL getFileURL()
        Get the URL of the audio file associated with this Audio object.
        Returns:
        The audio file's URL.

      • getFileName

        public java.lang.String getFileName()
        Get the filename and extension (not the complete path) of the audio file associated with this Audio object.
        Returns:
        The audio file's name.

      • getNumPlaybacks

        public long getNumPlaybacks()
        Get the number of Playback instances that are currently associated with this Audio object.
        Returns:
        The number of Playbacks.

      • shutdown

        protected static void shutdown()
        Shutdown the Audio's ExecutorService in an orderly manner, rejecting new play requests while allowing any currently playing instances of Playback to finish before the system exits. This method should only be called by the QwickSound system's shutdown method.
